verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> when Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto him, after <S%H834><s%> he had gone <S%H935><s%> in to Bathsheba. <S%H1339><s%> Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, O God, <S%H430><s%> according to your loving kindness: <S%H2617><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> blot <S%H4229><s%> out my transgressions. <S%H6588><s%>
Wash <S%H3526><s%> me thoroughly <S%H7235><s%> from my iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and cleanse <S%H5352><s%> me from my sin. <S%H2403><s%>
For I acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> my transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> and my sin <S%H2403><s%> is ever <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.

Against you, you only, <S%H905><s%> have I sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in your sight: <S%H5869><s%> that you might be justified <S%H6663><s%> when you speak, <S%H1696><s%> and be clear <S%H2135><s%> when you judge. <S%H8199><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I was shaped <S%H2342><s%> in iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> and in sin <S%H2399><s%> did my mother <S%H517><s%> conceive <S%H3179><s%> me.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> you desire <S%H2654><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> in the inward <S%H2910><s%> parts: and in the hidden <S%H5640><s%> part you shall make me to know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
Purge <S%H2398><s%> me with hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and I shall be clean: <S%H2891><s%> wash <S%H3526><s%> me, and I shall be whiter <S%H3835><s%> than snow. <S%H7950><s%>
Make me to hear <S%H8085><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness; <S%H8057><s%> that the bones <S%H6106><s%> which you have broken <S%H1794><s%> may rejoice. <S%H1523><s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> from my sins, <S%H2399><s%> and blot <S%H4229><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> my iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
Create <S%H1254><s%> in me a clean <S%H2889><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> and renew <S%H2318><s%> a right <S%H3559><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me.
Cast <S%H7993><s%> me not away from your presence; <S%H6440><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> not your holy <S%H6944><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> from me.
Restore <S%H7725><s%> to me the joy <S%H8342><s%> of your salvation; <S%H3468><s%> and uphold <S%H5564><s%> me with your free <S%H5081><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
Then will I teach <S%H3925><s%> transgressors <S%H6586><s%> your ways; <S%H1870><s%> and sinners <S%H2400><s%> shall be converted <S%H7725><s%> to you.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from bloodguiltiness, <S%H1818><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> you God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation: <S%H8668><s%> and my tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall sing <S%H7442><s%> aloud <S%H7442><s%> of your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
O Lord, <S%H136><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> you my lips; <S%H8193><s%> and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall show <S%H5046><s%> forth your praise. <S%H8416><s%>
For you desire <S%H2654><s%> not sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%> else would I give <S%H5414><s%> it: you delight <S%H7521><s%> not in burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering.

The sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are a broken <S%H7665><s%> spirit: <S%H7307><s%> a broken <S%H7665><s%> and a contrite <S%H1794><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> you will not despise. <S%H959><s%>
Do good <S%H3190><s%> in your good pleasure <S%H7522><s%> to Zion: <S%H6726><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> you the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall you be pleased <S%H2654><s%> with the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> with burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering and whole <S%H3632><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering: then <S%H227><s%> shall they offer <S%H5927><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> on your altar. <S%H4196><s%>
